text: Konstantin Belevich (born 16 June 1968) is a Belarusian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Belarus Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Konstantin Belevich
